      • createUrbanIsletShp

        public static java.io.File createUrbanIsletShp​(java.io.File parcelFile,
                                               java.io.File outFolder)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               org.opengis.referencing.NoSuchAuthorityCodeException,
                                               org.opengis.referencing.FactoryException
        Generate urban islet shapefile out of a parcel plan. Urban islet can be viewed as a block but must have a discontinuity (i.e. road or public space) between them.
        Parameters:
        parcelFile - input parcel
        outFolder - folder where goes the generated urban islet
        Returns:
        a collection of urban islet
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.opengis.referencing.NoSuchAuthorityCodeException
        org.opengis.referencing.FactoryException

        public static java.io.File createUrbanIslet​(java.io.File parcelFile,
                                            java.io.File outFolder)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Generate urban islet shapefile out of a parcel plan. Urban islet can be viewed as a block but must have a discontinuity (i.e. road or public space) between them.
        Parameters:
        parcelFile - input parcel
        outFolder - folder where goes the generated urban islet
        Returns:
        a collection of urban islet
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createUrbanIslet

        public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection createUrbanIslet​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcel)
                                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Generate urban islet out of a parcel plan. Urban islet can be viewed as a block but must have a discontinuity (i.e. road or public space) between them.
        Parameters:
        parcel - input parcel
        Returns:
        a SimpleFeatureCollection of urban islet
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createBufferBorder

        Get the border of a studied zone. Buffers have fixed values and could be parametrized.
        Parameters:
        in - input SimpleFeatureCollection
        Returns:
        the border without the inside geometry
